name: smo-rando
description: Moon Randomizer for Super Mario Odyssey

scripts.package-win: electron-packager ./ smo-rando --overwrite --asar --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --icon=logo.ico --out=build --version-string.CompanyName=RampantEpsilon --version-string.ProductName="Super Mario Odyssey Moon Randomizer v2.2.0"

author: Tom "RampantEpsilon" Ware
